price: Nítorí náà, ṣe sùúrù fún ìdájọ́ Olúwa rẹ. Má ṣe tẹ̀lé ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀ tàbí aláìmoore kan nínú wọn.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مِنۡهُمۡ ءَاثِمًا أَوۡ كَفُورٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'bir liḥuk'mi rabbika walā tuṭiʿ min'hum āthiman aw kafūran
